name: Richard Banach
content: Richard Banach - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Richard Banach Dr Senior Lecturer, Systems and Software Security https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0243-9434 Personal profile BiographyFor accurate and up to date info, see http://www.cs.man.ac.uk/~banachResearch interestsFor accurate and up to date info, see http://www.cs.man.ac.uk/~banachMy groupFormal MethodsOpportunitiesEnquiries from prospective postgraduate students interested in working with me are welcome. Please see my homepage (http://www.cs.man.ac.uk/~banach) for details of my research interests and my email address. Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all. This person’s work contributes towards the following SDG(s): Research Beacons, Institutes and PlatformsDigital Futures Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Richard Banach is active.
